items.q: Does the AI really replace my support staff?
items.a: The AI automates 87% of all support requests â€“ equivalent to 2-3 full-time employees with average ticket volume. Simple questions (product availability, order tracking, policies) are solved instantly by the AI. Complex cases are intelligently handed off to your team with complete context.

items.q: What happens with complex requests the AI cannot answer?
items.a: The AI knows when it can't help. For complex questions, complaints, or when the customer explicitly requests a human, the AI seamlessly transfers to your team. Your agent sees the complete conversation history, all collected information (order number, phone, photos) and knows exactly what to do â€“ no information is lost.

items.q: How accurate is the AI? Does it make mistakes?
items.a: The AI works with 99.8% accuracy because it only responds with real data from your Shopify store â€“ no hallucinations, no estimates. Each response is self-evaluated on 5 dimensions (0-100 points). Only responses with score â‰¥90 are sent automatically. When uncertain, the AI prefers to escalate to your team.

items.q: Do I need to train the AI or enter data?
items.a: No! The AI automatically imports all your Shopify data during installation: products, orders, customers, policies, pages, blog articles. Change something in Shopify? The AI knows within 5 seconds through real-time synchronization. Zero setup, zero maintenance, zero manual work.

items.q: How quickly is the AI productive?
items.a: From installation: 60 seconds until the AI is ready to use. It can immediately answer product questions, track orders, and explain policies. The AI knows your complete store catalog from the first moment â€“ no training required.

items.q: Can I review AI responses before they're sent?
items.a: Yes! You control the auto-send threshold. Set it to 90 for conservative (more manual reviews) or 80 for balanced (more automation). AI responses below the threshold go to the review queue where you can edit or approve them before sending.

The AI supports 100+ languages and automatically detects which language the customer is writing in. German, English, French, Spanish, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese â€“ all automatic, no configuration needed. The AI responds fluently in the customer's language.

items.q: Is my customer data stored securely?
items.a: Yes! We are ISO 27001 certified and GDPR compliant. All data is stored encrypted (TLS 1.3), and you have full control. Uninstall = complete automatic data deletion within 24 hours.

Under 60 seconds. One click in the Shopify App Store, and ReplAInow automatically begins importing your store data. Activate the widget in the theme editor (1 click), done. No technical knowledge required.
No contract lock-in â€“ you can cancel anytime. Upon uninstall, all your data is automatically deleted. No hidden costs, no cancellation period, no fine print.
